title: 128. Chef Robert Irvines Virus Safe Pro  Real-Time Verification Software to Help Restaurants
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with celebrity chef Robert Irvine, the host of Food Network’s Restaurant: Impossible. Barron and Irvine explore how restaurant owners can implement real-time verification software to save their business post-pandemic.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
